definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 這條半徑隨着車輪的向前移動在旋轉着。

sentences.english: All of the cow mountain say that the felloe veins is very clear.
sentences.chinese: 牛山全說，車輪的紋路很清楚。

sentences.english: Bilateral wheel group is a small lifting appliances.
sentences.chinese: 雙邊車輪組是一種小型起重機械。

sentences.english: As the rover trundled around, its wheels kicked up soil rich in sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 當漫遊車四處工作時，車輪拖出了富含硫酸鹽的泥土。

sentences.english: But doesn't actually matter how fast the wheel is rolling?
sentences.chinese: 不過實際上與車輪的翻滾速度沒有關係嗎？

sentences.english: Wheels of mountain bikes range from 26 to 29 inches.
sentences.chinese: 車輪的山地自行車範圍從26至29英寸。

sentences.english: Hearing the wheels on the drawbridge, Puss in Boots hastened out.
sentences.chinese: 聽見吊橋上車輪的聲音，穿靴子的貓急忙跑了出來。

sentences.english: The batteries then drive motors in the wheels.
sentences.chinese: 然後電池組驅動車輪電機。

sentences.english: The transmission also contains a set of gears that can reverse the direction of the wheels.
sentences.chinese: 變速器還有一套使得車輪反向運動的齒輪。

sentences.english: Police booted the car with unpaid fines.
sentences.chinese: 警察給那輛不繳罰款的汽車扣上車輪鎖。

sentences.english: Remove 2 Philips screws on each side of the bumper in wheel wells.
sentences.chinese: 刪除2飛利浦螺絲釘，每邊的保險槓在車輪水井。

sentences.english: Add the front axle with its wheels and spacers, as shown in the illustration.
sentences.chinese: 添加前軸與車輪和間隔，所顯示的說明。

sentences.english: It is like the spokes in the wheel.
When braking, the steering will become impossible if the front wheels are blocked.
sentences.chinese: 制動時前車輪抱死會出現喪失轉向能力的情況。

sentences.english: I am looking for an " AEOLUS" Tire supplier directly from china.
sentences.chinese: 尋找汽車輪胎，請中國的供應商與我們聯繫。

definition: lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
